title: Lara Bingle has superhero-themed cake for her son Racer after revealing she is pregnant
text:
She recently debuted her burgeoning bump following weeks of speculation she is expecting her third child with husband, Sam Worthington.

And it appears Lara Worthington (née Bingle) isn't immune to a few pregnancy cravings, posting a snap of herself tucking into her son's birthday cake on Tuesday.

Taking to Instagram, the 32-year-old former bikini model shared a photo of the superhero-themed cake, along with a video of herself taking a big bite out of a slice.

The elaborate chocolate cake, which was emblazoned with fondant icing to reflect superheros such as Spider-Man, Superman and Batman, read 'Happy Birthday Racer'.

A follow-up photo shows Lara taking a big bite out of the delicious dessert, while her recently adopted puppy can be seen cheekily eyeing off the cake in the background.

As Lara devours the tasty treat, the adorable pup leans forward and tries to steal a sneaky piece while licking his lips.

Sweet treat! Lara Worthington (nee Bingle) tucked into her son's elaborate birthday cake on Tuesday as she expects her third child with Sam Worthington

The accompanying caption simply stated 'Otis', which may suggest the model has finally given her super cuddly pet a name.

While Lara and Sam remain tight-lipped about their latest pregnancy, it didn't stop her from gushing over her fur baby on Instagram recently.

'The newest addition to our family... #adopted,' she captioned a sweet photo of the pup, which shows the adorable dog lying on a rug.

Pregnancy cravings? Taking to Instagram, Lara (pictured) shared a video of herself taking a big bite out of a slice

Temptation much?! A follow-up snap shows Lara's recently adopted puppy (pictured) cheekily eyeing off the cake in the background

Lara's post came after she recently revealed a glimpse of her baby bump while enjoying a casual workout in Los Angeles, earlier this month.

In recent months, she has been pictured several times wearing loose-fitting clothes that conspicuously covered up her tummy.

A friend of the couple disclosed their baby news to The Daily Telegraph in August, saying: 'It is early days but she's very excited. Lara is pregnant with her third child.'
description: She recently debuted her burgeoning  bump  following weeks of speculation she is expecting her third child with husband, Sam Worthington.
authors: Mark Brook For Daily Mail Australia
